name: Pixel Pro Tennis (itch)
description:
Pixel Pro Tennis, based on the classic game Pong. Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5. I recently replaced the tennis court to a premade perspective rather than using the perspective object. This makes sure it will be mobile friendly. I also added an umpire that closely watches the ball, and added speech bubbles to explain umpire calls. The crowd is also now more lively, which improves the atmosphere. Enjoy :)

*   Spacebar or Ctrl to serve (hint only serve when the ball is high)

*   Spacebar or Ctrl to hit ball

*  Ctrl button works best on Microsoft Edge (as Spacebar moves the webpage down)

*   Left and right arrows to move
